Translations.Text: Their Lord don them bon news mercy approval el Him gxarden kie ili gxoj everlasting bliss
Eternally ili abide therein. DI POSED great recompense
O vi kred ne ally eben your parents your siblings ili prefer disbelieving over kred! Those among vi ally them transgressing

Proklam Se your parents your infan your siblings your spouses your famili mon vi earned negoc vi worry hejm vi cherish est beloved al vi than DI His messenger striving en His ig tiam just wait DI brings His judgment DI ne direkt wicked popol
DI granted VI victory many SITUACI. Tag Hunayn vi igx tro fier da your great numer. Consequently gxi ne help vi je all spacious ter igx straitened vi vi torn around fled
Tiam DI send contentment His messenger believers. Li send down invisible soldat; Li tiel pun those disbelieved This est requital disbelievers
